00032 /* \file     egs_fortran_geometry.cpp
00033  *  \brief    A Fortran interface for using egspp geometries (implementation).
00034 */
00035 
00036 #include "egs_fortran_geometry.h"
00037 #include "egs_base_geometry.h"
00038 #include "egs_simple_container.h"
00039 #include "egs_input.h"
00040 #include "egs_functions.h"
00041 
00042 #include <cctype>
00043 #include <cstring>
00044 using namespace std;
00045 
00046 static EGS_SimpleContainer<EGS_BaseGeometry *> egspp_f_geoms;
00047 
00048 const static char *egspp_f_error_message = "%s: Invalid geometry index %d\n";
00049 
00050 extern __extc__ void EGS_EXPORT F77_OBJ_(egspp_init_geometry,EGSPP_INIT_GEOMETRY)(
00051     EGS_I32 *igeom, const char *file_name, int flength) {
00052     int n = flength-1;
00053     while (isspace(file_name[n]) && n > 0) {
00054         --n;
00055     }
00056     char *fname = new char [n+1];
00057     for (int j=0; j<n; ++j) {
00058         fname[j] = file_name[j];
00059     }
00060     fname[n] = '\0';
00061     EGS_Input input;
00062     input.setContentFromFile(fname);
00063     delete [] fname;
00064     EGS_BaseGeometry *g = EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry(&input);
00065     if (g) {
00066         *igeom = egspp_f_geoms.size();
00067         g->ref();
00068         egspp_f_geoms.add(g);
00069     }
00070     else {
00071         egsWarning("egspp_init_geometry: failed to create a geometry from "
00072                    "the input in file %s\n",fname);
00073         *igeom = -1;
00074     }
00075 }
00076 
00077 extern __extc__ void EGS_EXPORT F77_OBJ_(egspp_howfar,EGSPP_HOWFAR)(
00078     const EGS_I32 *igeom, const EGS_I32 *ireg,
00079     const EGS_Float *x, const EGS_Float *y, const EGS_Float *z,
00080     const EGS_Float *u, const EGS_Float *v, const EGS_Float *w,
00081     EGS_I32 *inew, EGS_I32 *newmed, EGS_Float *ustep) {
00082     int ig = *igeom;
00083     if (ig < 0 || ig >= egspp_f_geoms.size()) {
00084         egsFatal(egspp_f_error_message,"egspp_howfar",ig);
00085     }
00086     EGS_Vector xx(*x,*y,*z), uu(*u,*v,*w);
00087     *inew = egspp_f_geoms[ig]->howfar(*ireg,xx,uu,*ustep,newmed);
00088 }
00089 
00090 extern __extc__ void EGS_EXPORT F77_OBJ_(egspp_hownear,EGSPP_HOWNEAR)(
00091     const EGS_I32 *igeom, const EGS_I32 *ireg,
00092     const EGS_Float *x, const EGS_Float *y, const EGS_Float *z,
00093     EGS_Float *tperp) {
00094     int ig = *igeom;
00095     if (ig < 0 || ig >= egspp_f_geoms.size()) {
00096         egsFatal(egspp_f_error_message,"egspp_hownear",ig);
00097     }
00098     EGS_Vector xx(*x,*y,*z);
00099     *tperp = egspp_f_geoms[ig]->hownear(*ireg,xx);
00100 }
00101 
00102 extern __extc__ void EGS_EXPORT F77_OBJ_(egspp_is_where,EGSPP_IS_WHERE)(
00103     const EGS_I32 *igeom,
00104     const EGS_Float *x, const EGS_Float *y, const EGS_Float *z,
00105     EGS_I32 *ireg) {
00106     int ig = *igeom;
00107     if (ig < 0 || ig >= egspp_f_geoms.size()) {
00108         egsFatal(egspp_f_error_message,"egspp_is_where",ig);
00109     }
00110 
00111     EGS_Vector xx(*x,*y,*z);
00112     *ireg = egspp_f_geoms[ig]->isWhere(xx);
00113 }
00114 
00115 extern __extc__ void EGS_EXPORT F77_OBJ_(egspp_n_regions,EGSPP_N_REGIONS)(
00116     const EGS_I32 *igeom, EGS_I32 *nreg) {
00117     int ig = *igeom;
00118     if (ig < 0 || ig >= egspp_f_geoms.size()) {
00119         egsFatal(egspp_f_error_message,"egspp_n_regions",ig);
00120     }
00121     *nreg = egspp_f_geoms[ig]->regions();
00122 }
00123 
00124 
00125 extern __extc__ void EGS_EXPORT F77_OBJ_(egspp_describe_geometry,EGSPP_DESCRIBE_GEOMETRY)(
00126     const EGS_I32 *igeom) {
00127     int ig = *igeom;
00128     if (ig < 0 || ig >= egspp_f_geoms.size()) {
00129         egsWarning(egspp_f_error_message,"egspp_describe_geometry",ig);
00130         return;
00131     }
00132     egspp_f_geoms[ig]->printInfo();
00133 }
00134 
00135 extern __extc__ void EGS_EXPORT F77_OBJ_(egspp_n_media,EGSPP_N_MEDIA)(EGS_I32 *nmed) {
00136     *nmed = EGS_BaseGeometry::nMedia();
00137 }
00138 
00139 extern __extc__ void EGS_EXPORT F77_OBJ_(egspp_get_medium_name,EGSPP_GET_MEDIUM_NAME)(
00140     const EGS_I32 *imed, char *medname, int mlength) {
00141     const static char *vacuum = "VACUUM";
00142     const char *the_medium;
00143     int im = *imed - 1;
00144     if (im >= 0 && im < EGS_BaseGeometry::nMedia()) {
00145         the_medium = EGS_BaseGeometry::getMediumName(im);
00146     }
00147     else {
00148         the_medium = vacuum;
00149     }
00150     int n = strlen(the_medium);
00151     if (n > mlength) {
00152         n = mlength;
00153     }
00154     int j;
00155     for (j=0; j<n; ++j) {
00156         medname[j] = the_medium[j];
00157     }
00158     for (j=n; j<mlength; ++j) {
00159         medname[j] = ' ';
00160     }
00161 }
